thread.title: What an update to Parisian hotel traditions
thread.title_full: What an update to Parisian hotel traditions - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Opera Liege, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: mariarizz0
title: What an update to Parisian hotel traditions
text: I stay in many hotels In this area as it is close to the train station. This is the best one I've found in 7 years coming several times a year. It has a really friendly staff, great breakfast with real food and hot coffee, and the best pillows and duvet I've ever had! The location isn't great because of the the part of paris this is. Imagine this is the sort of comparable location to say port authority in NYC. But the hotel is wonderful and there are tons of delicious restaurants to walk to.
